text_block_list.text: It was another beautiful day. I was on my way to the trainer's office in a good mood when—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Move it, move it, move it pleaaaseee!
(Dashdashdashdashdash!!)
(Zshhhhhh!)
The horsegirl who had been running at a tremendous pace — Sakura Bakushin O — came to a stop right in front of me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Phew, emergency stop — success!! Swift decisions, immediate action, that's me!
choice_data_list: Y-You gave me a moment there…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm very sorry, I was in a hurry!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But, this is Tracen Academy. The corridors are for running, the last three furlongs are before the gate! I suggest you pay attention from now on!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oops. I'd like to give you some more tips on life at the academy, but…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm sure my classmates are waiting for me to show up, so I'll be off!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trusty class president Sakura Bakushin O is on her way～! Bakushin Bakushiiiiin!!!
As stupendously quickly as she had come, Sakura Bakushin O ran off again.
Her bewildering comments aside, I was very impressed with her acceleration and spirit…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Youuu! Hold it right theeere!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As long as the class president blood runs in my veins — no, even if it stops — I won't allow you to skip on cleaning duty!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Class president Daash!! Tooooooooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Your class president brings fortunate news! Goood neeews! Today's…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Today's cafeteria dessert is sakura mochi! You hear right, sakura mochi!! I simply adore sakura mochi!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: How could anyone resist running straight over to eat some! Come, come, follow me! Forwards! Bakushiiiiiin!
It was far from the last time I saw her busily running around the academy that day. A little later—
(Knock knock! Slide!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! A pleasure to meet you! I'm Sakura Bakushin O, class president!
choice_data_list: It was "a pleasure to meet you" a while ago…
It was "a pleasure to meet you" earlier…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huwhoa!? What now…!? You mean…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You've already heard of and fallen in love with my beautiful and wonderful class president ways?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What's that? You think I've transcended class presidentism, and became more like class presigod?! You're making me blush! Tell me more!
…I conveyed to this out of control girl that I was the trainer from this morning.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it, I've seen your face before!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well! You've cleared up my misunderstanding, and I've come to know who you are! We've both gained something!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, I'll leave you to enjoy a wonderful day! So long!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: W A I T !!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I, as the dependable class president, was asked by the teacher to deliver a document!
Sakura Bakushin O handed me a document. Skimming through, I found that it contained information on the Selection Race to be held this weekend.
Incidentally, I noticed the name "Sakura Bakushin O" on the race entrants list…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir! You're welcome! Leave it to my class president skills!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now then, next I need to… report to the teacher, change the water in the vases, put up the new class news poster, inspect the training course—
choice_data_list: A busy day, it sounds like.
A busy day, it sounds like.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir, 'cause I'm the class president! To help out and be a good role model to everyone, I must put in the effort every day!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As I have gloriously done from childhood.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: With apples and oranges, they called me a "child prodigy". With sprinting, they called me a "speed prodigy"!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I was often told when my parents heard my first cries, they knew that they had "given birth to someone who would lead the world on the right path".

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And a turning point came when I was in first grade!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What do you think it was? I'll give you a hint: it starts with a "c", has an "pre" in the middle, and a "t" at the end!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So!! I!! Was!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Candidates were asked for. The class, shy and quiet… The clock could be heard ticking… And there I was, my full attention to the butterflies by the window…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Eventually, the teacher turned to me — sitting in the front seat — and said…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: "Only a good girl can do this job, to be a role model for everyone. How about it?"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's the moment I knew for sure!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I am the class president!! And the class president is me!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Me, a child prodigy full of excellence and divine speed, born into this world to guide everyone down the right path as class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oops, this chat has gone on too long! Now if you'll excuse me, I have to be off!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin Bakushiiiiin!!
And Sakura Bakushin O ran away at the same breakneck speed I'd witnessed that morning.
I'm not sure what she was on about, but I was kind of interested in the way she'd run in the Selection Race.
… Just kind of.
